org.apache.poi.util

Class HexRead

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.util.HexRead

  • public class HexRead
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities to read hex from files. TODO - move to test packages(从文件中读取十六进制的实用程序。TODO -转向测试包)

      static byte[] readData(java.io.InputStream stream, int eofChar) 
      static byte[] readData(java.io.InputStream stream, java.lang.String section)
      Same as readData(String) except that this method allows you to specify sections within a file.(与readData（字符串）相同，只是该方法允许您指定文件中的部分。)
      static byte[] readData(java.lang.String filename)
      This method reads hex data from a filename and returns a byte array.(此方法从文件名中读取十六进制数据并返回字节数组。)

    • Method Detail

      • readData

        public static byte[] readData(java.lang.String filename)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        This method reads hex data from a filename and returns a byte array. The file may contain line comments that are preceded with a # symbol.(此方法从文件名中读取十六进制数据并返回字节数组。该文件可能包含前面带有#符号的行注释。)
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename to read(文件名-要读取的文件名)
        Returns:
        The bytes read from the file.(从文件读取的字节。)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was a problem while reading the file.(java.io. IOResponse-如果读取文件时出现问题。)

      • readData

        public static byte[] readData(java.io.InputStream stream,
                              java.lang.String section)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Same as readData(String) except that this method allows you to specify sections within a file. Sections are referenced using section headers in the form: 
          [sectioname]
        (与readData（字符串）相同，只是该方法允许您指定文件中的部分。使用以下形式的节标题引用节： [部分名称])
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException(java.io.IOException)
        See Also:
        readData(String)

      • readData

        public static byte[] readData(java.lang.String filename,
                              java.lang.String section)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException(java.io.IOException)
